about_the_game:
Enter the Exit Doors escape room company to play a series of escape rooms. Your goal is to find the exit from each "escape room", although the rooms may have large open areas and different buildings. Collect items to help you get to the door. In the inventory or closer examination, you can rotate the objects freely and see if there is anything to see on the other side. There is also the task of finding the missing stapler and finding out what the cake is about.

Classic Point & Click Interaction

Exit Doors is a traditional point & click adventure, with cunning conundrums and puzzles for you to solve. You search for clues and items and talk with game characters. You can interact some objects during game play and also in inventory sometimes, and sometimes also with another object. Hotspots are easy to find, since you can see them all with a single button press. Objects and characters may have variating interaction options depending on the game state. There is a hint system available in the game after you get the radio.

Localizations up and coming

There will be a localization of the subtitles for German, French and Spanish. Other languages may follow.

short_description: You play a classical point and click adventure where you enter an escape room company called Escape rooms and try to navigate through various escape rooms. You also try find a missing stapler to get a date with the girl in reception. Solve puzzles and mysteries in a classic point-n-click adventure.
